casebody.data:
RUSSELL-CRONIN CO., Inc., v. DIRECTOR GENERAL OF RAILROADS. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. November 7, 1921.) No. 26. Appeal from the District Court of the United States for the Southern District of New York. Uibel by the Russell-Cronin Company, Inc., against the Director General of Railroads. From a decree dismissing the libel, libelant appeals. Affirmed. Park & Mattison, of New York City (Samuel Park, of New York. City, of counsel), for appellant. Harrington, Bigham & Englar, of New York City (T. Catesby Jones and Eeonard J. Matteson, both of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before ROGERS, HOUGH, and MANTON, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed.
